result.eng: His son has left him and he has no news of him.
result.ga: Tá a mhac imithe uaidh agus gan tásc ná tuairisc aige air
result.orig: Tá a mhac imithe uaidh agus gan tásc ná tuairisc aige air
result.html: Tá a mhac imithe uaidh agus gan tásc ná tuairisc aige airHis son has left him and he has no news of him.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ṁac imiṫe uaiḋ agus gan tásc ná tuairisc aige airHis son has left him and he has no news of him.

result.eng: The spy was sending reports back to Russia.
result.ga: Bhí an spiaire ag seoladh tuairiscí ar ais chun na Rúise
result.orig: Bhí an spiaire ag seoladh tuairiscí ar ais chun na Rúise
result.html: Bhí an spiaire ag seoladh tuairiscí ar ais chun na RúiseThe spy was sending reports back to Russia.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an spiaire ag seolaḋ tuairiscí ar ais ċun na RúiseThe spy was sending reports back to Russia.

result.eng: Reports started coming from Washington that the Pentagon had been hit.
result.ga: Thosaigh tuairiscí ag teacht as Washington gur buaileadh an Pentagon
result.orig: Thosaigh tuairiscí ag teacht as Washington gur buaileadh an Pentagon
result.html: Thosaigh tuairiscí ag teacht as Washington gur buaileadh an PentagonReports started coming from Washington that the Pentagon had been hit.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ tuairiscí ag teaċt as Waẛington gur buaileaḋ an PentagonReports started coming from Washington that the Pentagon had been hit.

result.eng: Around the time the other tower fell, reports were coming in of a jet missing in Pennsylvania.
result.ga: Thart fán am ar thit túr eile an Lárionaid bhí tuairiscí ag teacht isteach go raibh scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvania
result.orig: Thart fán am ar thit túr eile an Lárionaid bhí tuairiscí ag teacht isteach go raibh scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvania
result.html: Thart fán am ar thit túr eile an Lárionaid bhí tuairiscí ag teacht isteach go raibh scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvaniaAround the time the other tower fell, reports were coming in of a jet missing in Pennsylvania.
result.ponchtml: Ṫart fán am ar ṫit túr eile an Lárionaid ḃí tuairiscí ag teaċt isteaċ go raiḃ scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvaniaAround the time the other tower fell, reports were coming in of a jet missing in Pennsylvania.

result.eng: Readers and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ga: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.orig: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.html: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ponchtml: Níor ġá gur ṫoṁaltóirí nuaċta iad an luċt léiṫeoireaċta nó éisteaċta a ṫuilleaḋ aċ táirgeoirí a ḃeaḋ in inṁe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a ḃailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
